item.title: pitchescurves
item.description: idea: creating sound from pure functions. The most elemental wave-forms are sine functions. a simple sine function. Every sound in nature can be deconstructed into a collection of sine functions. A single sine function can only be deconstructed into itself and is therefor called “pure”. Some years ago I had the idea of constructing “sound emoji” - abstract representations of emotions through sound. The idea was to create short sound of ~1s that can deliver an emotion with the most basic means.
